title.rendered: Chris Hemsworth, Corey Gamble & More: Star Sightings 12.23.2015

content.rendered:
I would like to be on Corey Gamble’s Christmas list, because anyone who shops at Chanel is OK by me.

And if celebs got the memo to head to The Grove a few days ago, then yesterday was the day to congregate at Barneys New York in Beverly Hills.  Everyone from Gigi Hadid to Elton John was seen at the luxury department store.

Meanwhile, Oscar winner Eddie Redmayne took his perfect cheekbones out of the country via LAX.  We’ll be seeing more of him, though, since The Danish Girl is getting all sorts of awards season buzz.

Ok bye.
